TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MERGER CLEARANCES
TEXT.BODY: The Secretary of State for Trade and Industry said he had decided not to refer the proposed acquisition by Reed International Plc <REED.L> of <Technical Publishing Company Inc> to the Monopolies and Mergers Commission. The proposed acquisition by <Rosehaugh Plc> of <The General Funds Investment Trust Plc> was also cleared. REUTER
